metadata.inclusion:
Ensure the door lock is open.
1. Press the [R] button for 6 seconds.
2. Press the [R] button, then press [1][4][7].
metadata.exclusion:
Ensure the door lock is open.
1. Press the [R] button for 6 seconds.
2. Press the [R] button, then press [3][6][9].
metadata.reset:
1. Press the [R] button for 9 seconds.
2. Press the [R] button, then press [1][2][3][6][5][4][7].
